content: these patterns are free on my blog however if you prefer the ad-free downloadable pdf version that can be purchased on my website https //www amenagerieofstitches com/products/crochet-pattern-seasonal-chubby-bunnies-bundle-pdf-amigurumi-pattern i never thought i d make another chubby bunny after completing the entire series last year the collection was perfectly finished or so i thought i was recently working on a cross stitch project that had strawberries on it and immediately knew i needed to make a strawberry bunny then i pulled out all the other fruits from the collection and they insisted i give them more friends and how could i say no they re the perfect bunch these fruit bunnies include a blueberry a kiwi an orange and a strawberry pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins hot glue pet slicker brush skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet back loops only front loops only slip_stitch finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
